course_name: Introduction to Research in Geological Sciences
description: This course provides students with the opportunity to conduct their own research project. Through this project students will develop important research skills such as safe laboratory and field work practices, proper record keeping, analysis and interpretation of results, and presentation of scientific ideas orally and in writing. Students wishing to do this course must discuss their project with the relevant academic staff member and gain approval before requesting enrolment through the school (by permission only).
prerequisites: #24 prior to enrolment and approval from Head of School
restricted: Students may count a maxium of #4 of project based courses towards their degree
